summary: Comprehensive testing of Employee Hub, Company Hub, and Administration features completed. All 32 backend API tests passed. All frontend pages load correctly with proper navigation and UI components.
seed_data_creation: Test data created with TEST_ prefix for cleanup
context_for_next_testing_agent: All Employee Hub and Administration features are fully functional. Backend APIs tested: Overtime, Permission, Transport, Leave, Expense, Announcements, Events, Holidays. Frontend pages verified: Employee Dashboard, Overtime Requests, Leave Management, Permission Requests, Transport Requests, Expense Claims, Announcements Manager, Events Manager, Holiday Calendar, Company Hub Weekly Meetings, Company Hub Payment Requests.
